altTitles.fr: J'ai épousé le père du héros

description.en:
In my real life, I was happy simping and fawning over Abel Louvremont, the main character of my favorite book *Persona*. But after a fateful car accident, I woke up in *Persona*, but when Abel is still a precious child. Now, as Aisha Heathcliff, I can simp the adorable Abel up close, squee!! I'll do anything I can to make sure he gets what he needs! And, somehow, that means I’m engaged to... his dad?!

---
I'd been stanning the hero for three years when I was suddenly caught red-handed by his tyrannical, doting father, Duke Hades Louvremont.

"Ceaseless pursuit, expensive gifts, and now you've come alone all this way up north with no regard for your life…"

"I'm sorry. I have no excuse."

"Alright, I've lost. Your devotion is undeniable."

"…You think so too? Even I admit that this is the pinnacle of devotion."

"Many women have pursued me, but none as persistently as you. I stand amazed. Let's hold it, then. Our wedding. As soon as possible."

"Ha… Yes, I'll accept my fate."
  
Silence.

"Wait, pardon?! What?"

What did he just say? Surely I must've misheard?

But the duke, smirking at my shocked face, gave the finishing blow, "I said I'll marry you."

Wow. The hero’s dad has an inflated ego.

---

description.ru:
Аиша, которая была поклонницей главного героя романа, погибла в результате несчастного случая, когда шла на автограф-мероприятие писателя. После этого, открыв глаза, она обнаружила, что стала единственной дочерью барона, имя которой даже ни разу не фигурировало в романе. Пребывая в восторге от возможности пообщаться со своими любимыми персонажами, девушка с удивлением узнает, что главному герою всё ещё семь лет. Аиша рада понаблюдать за его драгоценным детством, поэтому она начинает свою жизнь заядлого фаната. Однако её действия замечает и неправильно понимает Аид, герцог Лувермонтский, отец главного героя. Герцог думает, что он нравится Аише, поэтому решает сделать ей предложение. Девушка соглашается и становится мачехой героя. Теперь она желает только счастливой жизни, но всё идет не так, как она ожидает.

---

description.uk:
Бути фанатом персонажа з роману протягом багатьох років, а потім потрапити у світ цього роману? Це ж просто мрія! І зараз ця мрія стала моєю дійсністю. Я переродилася Аїшою Ескліф, другорядним персонажем улюбленої історії. Тепер я зможу спостерігати за дорослішанням мого улюбленця, Авеля Лувмонта! 
Я анонімно дарувала дорогі подарунки, відвідували ті ж заходи, що й Авель, але, от халепа, його батько, відомий своєю жорстокістю і любов’ю до сина, помітив мою підозрілу активність. Я вже готувалася до смерті, коли мене покликали до його маєтка, але він… запропонував вийти заміж за нього.

---

altTitles.en: Blood Diver Ringo and the Fishbowl Man

altTitles.ja: 血潜り林檎と金魚鉢男

description.en:
A terrible creature has been plaguing the community: a man with a fishbowl for a head. When he attacks someone, the goldfish leaps out of his bowl and drinks their blood. The victim is irreversibly transformed into a goldfish! This terrible crime has happened to high-schooler Kousuke's little sister. With no other option, he takes care of his goldfish-sister as best he can.  
  
One day, he comes across a strange girl named Ringo, who wears a school swimsuit, carries an umbrella, and keeps a gun hanging around her neck. Ringo is an apprentice blood diver, and the gun is her way of shooting herself into the wounds of the fishbowl man's victims. If she can get to them in time, she can prevent them from turning into goldfish. Ringo's mentor, Ichigo, says that she's heard of a way to turn people back from goldfish into humans. Kousuke is determined to help Ringo find a way to help his sister and the loved ones of his friends at school who have met the same fishy fate!
description.pt-br:
Uma criatura terrível tem assolado a comunidade: um homem com um aquário no lugar da cabeça. Quando ele ataca alguém, o peixinho dourado pula de sua tigela e bebe seu sangue.  A vítima é irreversivelmente transformada em um peixinho dourado! Este terrível crime aconteceu com a irmã mais nova do colegial Kousuke.  Sem outra opção, ele cuida da irmã peixinho como pode.
  
Um dia, ele encontra uma garota estranha chamada Ringo, que veste um maiô escolar, carrega um guarda-chuva e mantém uma arma pendurada no pescoço. Ringo é um aprendiz de mergulhador de sangue, e a arma é sua maneira de atirar nas feridas das vítimas do homem do aquário. Se ela conseguir alcançá-los a tempo, poderá impedir que se transformem em peixinhos dourados.  O mentor de Ringo, Ichigo, diz que ouviu falar de uma maneira de transformar as pessoas de peixinhos dourados em humanos. Kousuke está determinado a ajudar Ringo a encontrar uma maneira de ajudar sua irmã e os entes queridos de seus amigos na escola que encontraram o mesmo destino de peixe!

One-shots inclusas:
Volume 2: Jigoku (Inferno), Kappa no Shokutaku (A Janta do Kappa)
Volume 3: Onikujo (Oni Killer)

description.en: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

altTitles.th: เบอร์เซิร์ก

altTitles.ja: ベルセルク

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.
description.th:
เบอร์เซิร์ก เป็นชื่อมังงะ แนวดาร์ค แฟนตาซี ของญี่ปุ่น วาดโดยเคนทาโร่ มิอุระ มีการดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในยุคกลางของยุโรป โดยได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากโลกแห่งจินตนิมิตด้านมืด มีตัวละครเอกของเรื่องคือ กัทส์ ทหารรับจ้างผู้โดดเดี่ยวและ กริฟฟิท หัวหน้าของกลุ่มทหารรับจ้างที่รวมตัวกันภายใต้ชื่อ กองพันเหยี่ยว

 [Shopee (ไทย)](https://shopee.co.th/berserk%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81-%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%84-%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1-1-20-%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87-i.63434898.1855330863)
description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

title.en: I Became a Renowned Family’s Sword Prodigy

altTitles.ru: Стал гением фехтования из великой семьи

description.en:
Baek Woojin is the youngest son of a renowned swordsman family who has neither talent in swordsmanship nor an impressive Aura.
Although he was dishonored by his own family and killed, he reincarnates as the owner of a Magic Sword.

His only goal is the destruction of his own family.
description.ko:
검술 재능도, 타고난 오러도 없었지만 누구보다 열심히 노력했던 검술명가 막내아들 백우진.
가문에서 버려져 비참하게 목숨을 잃었지만,마검의 주인이 되어 10년 전으로 회귀한다.
가문을 무너뜨리겠다는 일념으로.

description.ru: После старшей школы Кохай поступает в университет, где планирует начать встречаться с девушкой. Зайдя в кампус он замечает темноволосую девушку и подходит к ней с пачкой сигарет, желая привлечь её внимание. Несмотря на то, что Кохай терпит неудачу, он собирается идти до конца и добиться её сердца.

description.en:
Ethel, who reincarnated into her favorite novel, has married the female lead’s brother Liena. She thought her marriage life was genuine, but soon enough she became tired of a husband who cared only for his sister and whose attention was always centered on Liena, yet was cold to her, so she filed for divorce.

“Divorce? Absolutely not!”

However, her opponent is a powerful duke, so she turns to Terrence, the villain of the original story to be her assistant for a smooth divorce.

“The only person I want to have by my side is you, Ethel.”

…But this man’s fate is to be hurt by Liena.

As the more she knew about Terrence, the more he seemed attractive to her?

altTitles.ja: 君が唄う薬恋歌

description.en:
A fantasy about a different world that celebrates life and sings of love.

A healer who has the unique ability to cure disease and is said to be the world's last hope. While on an overseas expedition, Laila, a newcomer to the world, meets a beautiful demoness named Lail, who is kept in the royal castle.  The two live out their predetermined destiny, and what develops between these two.
An artist's boyfriend cheats on her. But she has the perfect revenge planned.

description.en: Countess Nicole's fiance, Chaos, is always by her childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!

description.en:
The MC transmigrated into a novel and became an extra from the novel. The novel is a murder thriller and the main character is a serial killer. He kills criminals with black magic making him a dark hero (think of him as Dexter or batman with dark magic). She (MC) doesn't have any death flags since she’s a background extra but she was a homeless girl of all things in such a dangerous novel. Somehow our MC saves the male lead and to thank her, he adopts her.

“Become my daughter.”

The richest, most powerful, and handsome duke asks her to be his child. The MC is freaked out since she knows he’s a cold blooded killer. Can she survive such a maniac? Yet he dotes on her and constantly says ‘my daughter is the cutest’! He wants to get master artists to draw her and gather poets to describe her adorableness. The duke also has a son. The apple doesn’t fall far from the tree; he also dotes on her. In this way, a beggar became a little princess. She also got used to people getting killed.

However there was still one problem. Our MC has turned sixteen and is wondering as a lady, will she have an arranged marriage? The whole house atmosphere quickly turns awkward. She realizes, perhaps they want her to stay here forever? Can she escape such a strange house? Everyone is so attached to her!

---
Duke Kallen de Lewelton is bloodthirsty and ruthless when it comes to killing criminals, but a total sucker when it comes to his new daughter! Peasant girl Lae learns this herself when a fateful run-in with the duke results in her adoption into the Lewelton home. Armed with a sharp mind and the knowledge from her past life, Lae makes the perfect addition to the family’s quest to quell injustice. But as the mysteries of the capital’s underbelly rise to the surface, will she and her new family withstand the return of a true criminal mastermind?

---

خلاصه داستان: مثل همیشه تناسخ اما تو جلد شخصیت فرعی ری بعنوان یه گدا متولد میشه اما تو ناولی که خودش تو زندگی قبلیش میخونده که شخصیت اصلیشم یه مرد دیوونست که با جادوی سیاه جنایتکارا رو میکشه و این اونو تبدیل به یه قهرمان تاریک میکنه ری چیزی جز یه گدا و شخصیت فرعی نیست اما خوشتیپ ترین، پولدارترین و قویترین مرد امپراتوری بعد اینکه برای دستگیری قاتل زنجیره ای ویلیام به قهرمان تاریکمون کمک میکنه ازش میخواد دخترش بشه حالا ری باید با یه قاتل خونسرد زندگی کنه و همش حواسش به زندگیش باشه اما این قاتل خونسرد همش میگه دخترم خوشگل ترینه!!!!

description.fr:
Juste au moment ou je m'approche de cet homme dans le but de lui demander de la nourriture, des souvenirs me reviennent en tête. Je connais cet homme, c'est le protagoniste principal d'un roman! Mais alors ça veut dire que je suis dans le livre?

Les souvenirs que j'ai reçu sont ceux de Yuna Han, une jeune femme qui adorait lire le roman *Les jours du duc de Lewellton* qui raconte l'histoire d'un homme puissant qui chasse les criminels de l'empire. Grâce à ce que je sais du livre, j'ai pu l'aider à arrêter un meurtrier et pour me remercier il me fait une drôle de proposition!

— Soyez ma fille unique.

...Comment?

---
Le MC a transmigré dans un roman et est devenu un figurant du roman. Le roman est un thriller policier et le personnage principal est un tueur en série. Il tue des criminels avec de la magie noire, faisant de lui un héros sombre (pensez à lui comme Dexter ou Batman avec de la magie noire). Elle (MC) n'a pas de drapeaux de la mort puisqu'elle est un arrière-plan supplémentaire, mais elle était une fille sans-abri de toutes choses dans un roman aussi dangereux. D'une manière ou d’une autre, notre MC sauve la vedette masculine et pour la remercier, il l'adopte.

«Deviens ma fille.»

Le duc le plus riche, le plus puissant et le plus beau lui ordonne d'être son enfant. Le MC est paniqué car elle sait qu'il est un tueur de sang-froid. Peut-elle survivre à un tel maniaque? Pourtant, il l'adore et dit constamment «ma fille est la plus mignonne!» Il veut que des maîtres artistes la dessinent et rassemble des poètes pour décrire son adorable. Le duc a un fils aussi. La pomme ne tombe pas loin de l’arbre; il raffole aussi d'elle. De cette façon, un mendiant est devenu une petite princesse. Elle s'est aussi habituée à ce que les gens se fassent tuer.

Cependant, il y avait toujours un problème. Notre MC a eu seize ans et se demande en tant que femme, aura-t-elle un mariage arrangé? L'atmosphère de toute la maison devient vite gênante. Elle se rend compte, peut-être qu'ils veulent qu'elle reste ici pour toujours? Peut-elle s'échapper d'une maison si étrange? Tout le monde est tellement attaché à elle!

---

description.id:
Re, seorang gembel yang tinggal di perumahan kumuh menjalani hari-harinya dengan meminta-minta. Selama 9 tahun hidup, ia tidak tahu kalau ternyata dirinya hidup kembali dalam novel yang ia baca sebelum mati di kehidupan sebelumnya. Sampai ia bertemu pria itu, seorang Dark Hero yang bekerja memburu orang-orang jahat untuk dihisap kekuatan magisnya. Sentuhan dari pria itu membuatnya teringat akan isi novel yang akhirnya membantu pria itu. Re pun diberikan hadiah dengan diangkat menjadi putri Duke Callen De Rwellton, Dark Hero berdarah dingin itu. Apa ingatan Re akan novel bisa terus membantu Callen? Bagaimana kehidupan Re dalam rumah keluarga Duke?

---
MC pindah ke novel dan menjadi tambahan dari novel. Novel ini adalah thriller pembunuhan dan karakter utama adalah seorang pembunuh berantai. Dia membunuh penjahat dengan ilmu hitam membuatnya menjadi pahlawan gelap (menganggapnya sebagai Dexter atau batman dengan ilmu hitam). Dia (MC) tidak memiliki tanda kematian karena dia adalah karakter tambahan latar belakang tetapi dia adalah gadis tunawisma dari semua hal dalam novel yang berbahaya. Entah bagaimana MC kita menyelamatkan pemeran utama pria dan untuk berterima kasih padanya, dia mengadopsinya.

“Jadilah putriku.”

Duke terkaya, paling kuat, dan tampan memerintahkan dia untuk menjadi anaknya. MC ketakutan karena dia tahu dia pembunuh berdarah dingin. Bisakah dia bertahan dari maniak seperti itu? Namun dia menyayanginya dan terus-menerus mengatakan ‘putriku yang paling lucu’! Dia ingin mendapatkan seniman master untuk menggambarnya dan mengumpulkan penyair untuk menggambarkan keindahannya. Duke alo memiliki seorang putra. Apel tidak jatuh jauh dari pohonnya; dia juga menyayanginya. Dengan cara ini, seorang pengemis menjadi seorang putri kecil. Dia juga terbiasa dengan orang yang terbunuh.

Namun masih ada satu masalah. MC kita telah berusia enam belas tahun dan bertanya-tanya sebagai seorang wanita, apakah dia akan dijodohkan? Suasana seluruh rumah dengan cepat berubah menjadi canggung. Dia menyadari, mungkin mereka ingin dia tinggal di sini selamanya? Bisakah dia melarikan diri dari rumah aneh seperti itu? Semua orang begitu terikat padanya!

---

description.ko:
사람이 마구 죽어 나가는 추리 소설 속 엑스트라가 되었다.
그것도 생존율 최저의, 꿈도 미래도 없는 거지소녀로!

"범인은 바로 저 사람입니다!"

눈 앞에서 사람이 죽어 나가는 걸 볼 수 없어서 몇 번 슬쩍 범인을 일러줬더니-

"내 딸이 되도록."
범죄자를 때려잡는 이 소설의 주인공이자,
제국 최고의 권력자인 공작님에게 입양을 제의 받았다!

배 곯는 뒷골목 생활은 이제 끝?!
폭신폭신한 빵을 두개나 먹어도 된다며 행복해하던 것도 잠시,
문득 소설 속 숨겨진 설정이 떠오르고 마는데.

'……잠깐. 이 소설, 주인공이 사이코패스라는 설정 아니었던가?'

악당에게는 누구보다 차가운 공작님, 하지만 내 딸에게는 따뜻하겠지!

로맨스릴러 육아물, <다크 히어로의 딸이 되는 법>

---

description.pt:
A MC transmigrou para um romance e se tornou uma figurante do romance. O romance é um thriller de assassinato e o personagem principal é um serial killer. Ele mata criminosos com magia negra, tornando-o um herói negro (pense nele como Dexter ou Batman com magia negra). Ela (MC) não tem nenhuma bandeira da morte, já que ela é uma figurante, mas ela era uma garota sem-teto em um romance tão perigoso. De alguma forma, nosso MC salva o protagonista masculino e, para agradecê-la, ele a adota.

"Torne-se minha filha."

O duque mais rico, poderoso e bonito ordena que ela seja sua filha. A MC está assustado, pois ela sabe que ele é um assassino de sangue frio. Ela pode sobreviver a um maníaco? No entanto, ele adora ela e diz constantemente que sua filha é a mais fofa! Ele quer que grandes artistas a desenhem e poetas descrevam sua adoração. O duque tem um filho. A maçã não cai longe da árvore; ele também adora ela. Desta forma, uma mendiga se tornou uma pequena princesa. Ela também se acostumou com a morte de pessoas.

No entanto, ainda havia um problema. Nossa MC fez dezesseis anos e está se perguntando, sendo uma dama ela terá um casamento arranjado? A atmosfera da casa inteira rapidamente se torna estranha. Ela percebe, talvez eles queiram que ela fique aqui para sempre? Ela pode escapar de uma casa tão estranha? Todos são tão apegados a ela!

---

Что, если серийный убийца предложит стать его приемной дочерью?Герцог Каллен Де Левельтон - темный маг, убивший 107 человек. Живое оружие империи, проклятое отнимать жизни ради того, чтобы продолжать существовать.Погибнув в своей первой жизни от неизлечимой болезни, главная героиня перерождается в теле маленькой сиротки Ле - персонажа массовки, вынужденного попрошайничать на улицах города.Их встреча изменит судьбы этого мира.После того, как Ле помогает Каллену предотвратить массовое убийство 30 человек, она получает от него неожиданное предложение...

description.tr:
Ana karakter bir romanın içerisine düşer ve orada silinik bir karakterin yerini alır. Romanın içindeki erkek karakterin, kara büyü ile kurbanlarını infaz ettiği bu gerilim romanında onu, karanlık bir kahraman yapar. Ölümle burun buruna gelmeyecek olan arka plandaki evsiz karakterimiz tehlikeli bir romanın içerisindedir. Her nasılsa bizim kız karakterimiz, erkek karakteri kurtarır ve onun tarafından evlatlık edinilir.

“Kızım ol.”

Oldukça zengin, güçlü ve yakışıklı dük kıza, çocuğu olmasını emreder. Ana karakter, soğukkanlı bir seri katil olduğunu bildiği için çıldırmıştır. Böyle bir manyaktan kurtulmak mümkün müdür? Ancak dük ona oldukça düşkündür. “Kızım en sevimlisi” deyip duruyordur! Usta sanatçıların onu çizmesini ve hayranlığını tanımlamak için şairleri uzak diyarlardan getirtir. Dükün ayrıca bir oğlu vardır, tabi olarak armut ağacın dibine düşer. Çocuğu da kızımıza oldukça düşkündür.

Ancak bir problem vardır. Ana karakterimiz 16 yaşına gelmiş ve düşüncelerinde görücü usulü evlilik yer etmiştir. Tüm evdeki atmosfer hızlıca garip bir hal alır. Kız bu değişikliğin farkına varır. Acaba aile üyeleri onun burada kalmasını istiyor mudur? Böyle bir evden kaçmayı başarabilecek midir? Herkes ona çokça düşkün!

---

description.en:
What's it like to have a mean cat?

Follow the hilarious daily life of the stinky-faced bitch cat "Maicha" and the masochist cat owner "Aman" that every cat owner can relate to!

There are also wonderful stories between Maicha’s cat friends and Aman’s friends and neighbors. The everyday shenanigans of cat owners...
description.zh:
养一只贱兮兮的猫是什么体验？

臭脸贱猫麦茶和抖M铲屎官阿满的爆笑日常，让每一个铲屎官都感同身受！

还有麦茶的猫咪朋友们，和阿满的朋友邻里之间发生的精彩故事。养猫一族的欢乐群像...

altTitles.pt-br: O amor puro de um vilão

description.en:
A world where special police exist to deal with criminals with unique abilities. An unreasonable villain comes to Han Doryeong, the strongest special police officer who was spending peaceful days! But something’s wrong with this criminal? The worst villain who loves the strongest hero, “Park Rosa’s” crazy love story.

---
Dumped after confessing to her first crush of three years, Rosa Park falls for her second when the nation’s favorite Superpowered Police Officer, Doryeong Han, swoops in to save her as she’s plummeting from a toppling building. A few years later, a mysterious villain called Blackdog appears, but Doryeong notices something is not quite right. Will the world’s worst villain ever win the heart of the strongest hero in the country?
description.fr: Rosa Park, une douce mais maladroite jeune femme dotée d'une force surhumaine et de pouvoirs incroyables, et qui a le don de se retrouver dans des situations rocambolesques, est prise à tort pour un impitoyable antihéros, alors qu'elle essaie d'attirer l'attention de son crush, un policier aux pouvoirs non moins impressionnants, le beau Doryung Han! Sera-t-elle capable d'avouer ses sentiments à son crush malgré les malentendus?
description.id: Park Rosa menemukan tambatan hati baru di sosok polisi khusus tampan bernama Han Doryeong segera setelah ia ditolak oleh cinta pertamanya. Sayangnya, Park Rosa berkali-kali gagal menemui Han Doryeong yang kepopulerannya menyaingi bintang idola. Park Rosa pun memutar otak demi mendekati sang penyelamat, dan menemukan satu cara yaitu dengan menjadi... penjahat?
description.ko:
특수능력을 가진 범죄자를 상대하기 위한 특수경찰이 존재하는 세계.
평화로운 나날을 보내던 최강의 특수경찰 '한도령'에게 감당할 수 없는 빌런이 찾아온다! 그런데 이 범죄자, 어딘가 이상하다?
최강의 히어로를 사랑하는 최악의 빌런 '박로사'의 우당탕탕 사랑이야기
description.zh:
GETBACK编剧浪漫作
爱上最强英雄的反派！
在为了对付具有特殊能力的罪犯而存在的特殊刑警的世界里，过着平凡日子的最强特殊刑警“韩道凌”，迎来了他无法承受的反派! 可这个反派好像哪里有些不对劲！
description.zh-hk: 在一場意外中，對超能特殊警察韓道靈一見鐘情的朴路紗，本以為自己只是個凡人，卻在某天突然發覺自己的超能力！而擁有過人超能力的她，選擇成為最強反派、並一步步接近深受眾人愛戴的萬人迷韓道靈，在正反兩極作用下，一部浪漫愛情喜劇即將展開……

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!

description.en:
Ellie was a girl who couldn’t talk or even write. By chance, she begins listening to three people’s secrets. The three start to develop an interest in Ellie, who listened to their words. However, a couple of days later, Ellie disappears without a trace. 

With Ellie 's disappearance, he who confessed that he has a crush on a man, he who enjoys games involving riddles, he who has a secret fetish, The three men start searching for her, yet no one comes to figure out where she went, since they only talked about their own stories and had no clue about hers. Voiceless Ellie. 

That was my name. 

(After the tables have turned) I began to speak again and by the favor of someone truly dear to me, I became a ”Countess". The commoner Ellie who once couldn’t talk, can now speak as “Lady Phever”. And when the time came to reunite with the three men, “……Ellie?” The Ellie you know from the past is now gone. “You’ve got the wrong person.” Perfectly spoken words left my mouth.

description.en:
In the novel *The Emperor and the Saintess*, the male lead and heroine were able to defeat the cursed dragons and the demons, as well as the final boss of the story, with their beautiful love.

"...Haha. I'd rather die now, so I can go in peace."

Rather than having a brilliant future and being hailed as a genius mage, I just want a secure future where I can have a comfortable retirement... That's what I wish, but when this world comes to an end, I'm the final boss. Please, just let me live... However, "Wait, isn't this the male lead, Siegren? Why is he here?"

Siegren, the heroic male lead who will save the world, is dying right in front of my eyes? The male lead whose mind and body where all tattered from rolling around in the battlefield.

"Siegren, I'm sure you'll have many things to do in the future. I promise to help you achieve that."

When I saw Siegren's wounds, I made a promise. This person, who suffered because of the lines I wrote. I promise to bring him happiness, a brilliant future, and a comfortable life.

---
Evil mage Fiona Green was destined to die at the hands of the protagonist couple in *The Emperor and the Saint*. That is until the story’s author became Fiona herself! Though mistreated, cast out by her pompous family, and thrown into the battle at Heylon, Fiona is determined to use her magic for good. But things take a rather unexpected turn when she rescues the male lead, Siegren, turning him from foe to friend… Will she successfully rewrite her fate without changing the story’s happy ending?

---

description.ru:
Я попала в тело Фионы, главной злодейки, чья душа была приговорена к вечным страданиям после ужасной кончины от рук главного героя. Её семья издевалась над ней только потому, что она была незаконнорожденной. И вот, переселившись в тело за 6 лет до начала романа, меня отправили на войну в возрасте 13 лет! К счастью, Фиона как главная злодейка романа оказалась гениальным магом. Я должна пережить нашествие монстров, но сейчас не могу находиться в центре поля боя. Как раз перед тем как я выдохлась, я столкнулась с главным героем-подростком. …Почему он здесь? Что ж, если главный герой здесь умрёт, то мир будет разрушен. Так что давайте сначала спасём его!

---

description.tr:
"İmparator ve Azize" romanında erkek başrol ve kadın başrol, lanetli ejderhaları, iblisleri ve hikâyenin son düşmanını güzel aşklarıyla yenmeyi başardı. "...Haha. Şimdi ölmeyi tercih ederim, böylece huzurla gidebilirim." Parlak bir geleceğe sahip dahi bir büyücü olarak yaşamak yerine, rahat bir emeklilik hayatı sürdürebileceğim güvenli bir gelecek istiyorum... Tek dileğim buydu fakat bu dünyanın sonu geldiğinde, son ve en güçlü düşman ben olacağım. Lütfen, sadece yaşamama izin verin... Ancak, "Bir dakika, bu erkek başrol Siegren değil mi?" "O neden burada?" Dünyayı kurtaracak kahraman erkek başrol Siegren gözlerimin önünde mi ölüyor? Savaş alanında hırpalanmaktan aklı ve vücudu parçalanan bir erkek başrol. "Siegren, eminim gelecekte yapacak çok şeyin olacak." "Bunu başarmana yardım edeceğime söz veriyorum." Siegren'ın yaralarını gördüğümde bir söz verdim. 'Yazdığım satırlar yüzünden acı çeken bu kişiye; mutluluk, parlak bir gelecek ve rahat bir hayat getireceğime söz veriyorum.' 

---

description.uk:
Я потрапила у тіло головної лиходійки, що приречена на смерть і вічні страждання душі. Її сім’я знущалась з неї лишень тому, що вона була позашлюбною дочкою графа.
І ось, перемістившись в тіло задовго до початку роману, мене відправили на війну. На щастя, я стану геніальним магом. Переживши основну навалу монстрів, я зіткнулась із головним героєм. 
Чому він тут? Якщо головний герой помре, то світ буде зруйновано. Врятуймо його!

---

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

altTitles.ja: ニセモノの錬金術師
ニセ錬

description.en:
In another world,
there was a person
who made a living
doing alchemy.

Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle……
A work full of fantasy has started serialization with overwhelming brushwork!
description.ja:
とある世界で、錬金術師として生きようとする、ひとりの人間がおりました。

『だんなさま――どうか助けてください』

異世界に転生した青年、パラケルススがであったのは、奴隷として売りに出された女性ノラだった。これは、あるひとりの錬金術師が、異世界でがんばるお話。

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

altTitles.ja: オーバーレブ！

description.en:
Over Rev! is a manga about a senior graduate named Ryouko. A while back, she injured her ankle in a track meet. Since then, she didn't know what to do with her life, until she finds out about street racing…

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Over Rev** (2008)

The Great Yan Empire exists in a world where respect can only be earned through strength. Within this Great Yan Empire, the four great clans have always stood above the rest. Among them, a particular incident in the Lin Clan resulted in the banishment of a certain individual who went on to start his own family, in hopes of one day being recognized again by the Lin Clan, and rejoining them…  
  
Hailing from a banished family of the Great Lin Clan, when Lin Dong was very young, he watched, powerless, as his talented father was easily crushed and crippled by the overwhelming genius of the great Lin Clan, Lin Langtian.  
  
With a despairing father, a heartbroken grandfather, and a suffering family, ever since that fateful day, Lin Dong has been driven by a deep purpose; to take revenge on the man who had taken everything and more from his family.  
  
Armed with nothing but willpower and determination, join Lin Dong as he unknowingly discovers a destiny greater than he could ever hope to imagine when he stumbles upon a mysterious stone talisman

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢 海皇再起 RERISE OF POSEIDON

altTitles.pt-br: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco - O Retorno de Poseidon

altTitles.ja-ro: Saint Seiya: Kaiou Saiki RERISE OF POSEIDON

description.en:
The sanctuary is exhausted after the battle against the Lord of Darkness Hades.
In the absence of Seiya and the others, the land was about to meet its end in the wrath of the goddess Nemesis!
At that moment, the Emperor of the Sea Poseidon awakens to Hades' call and, together with the Seven Marina Generals challenges Nemesis and their Heroic Souls who serve her in battle!
description.es:
El santuario está agotado tras la batalla contra el Señor de la Oscuridad Hades.
En ausencia de Seiya y los demás, ¡la tierra estaba a punto de encontrar su fin en la ira de la diosa Némesis!
¡En ese momento, el Emperador del Mar Poseidón despierta a la llamada de Hades y, junto con los Siete Generales del Mar, desafía a Némesis y a las Almas Heroicas que le sirven en la batalla!
description.ja:
冥王ハーデスとの闘いで疲弊した聖域。
星矢たちも不在でという中で、女神ネメシスの怒りにふれ地上は破滅の時を迎えようとしていた！
その時、ハーデスの呼びかけで覚醒した海皇ポセイドンは、七人の海将軍と共に、ネメシスとそれに仕える英魂士に戦いを挑む！
description.es-la:
El santuario está agotado tras la batalla contra el Señor de la Oscuridad Hades.
En ausencia de Seiya y los demás, ¡la tierra estaba a punto de encontrar su fin en la ira de la diosa Némesis!
¡En ese momento, el Emperador del Mar Poseidón despierta a la llamada de Hades y, junto con los Siete Generales del Mar, desafía a Némesis y a las Almas Heroicas que le sirven en la batalla!

title.en: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero

altTitles.en: I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!

altTitles.es-la: Era más fuerte que el héroe así que oculté mi poder

altTitles.th: แกร่งเกินผู้กล้า แต่ซ่าไม่ได้

description.en:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

altTitles.es: Me convertí en la amiga del protagonista masculino

altTitles.en: I Became the Male Lead's Female Friend

description.ar:
لودريك باوزر، القائد الذكر ذو المظهر المجنون. هل تجسدت من جديد كصديقة معجبة بك؟! من المقرر استخدامه في مسرحية الحب للشخصيات الرئيسية... أنا، داليا أفيري أستمتع بحياة ملعقة ذهبية. سأقيم علاقة ساخنة مع رجال وسيمين من جميع أنحاء العالم! بالمناسبة.........
 
"مرحبا يا Bowser Young-ae."

"......آه!"

هل أخطأت في ذلك كفتاة وجعلته يبكي؟

بعد ذلك، أصبحنا قريبين لفترة من الوقت، نامجو، الذي انفصل في الحرب والتقى مرة أخرى......

يبدو أن العيون التي لم أرها قد انخفضت كثيرا يا أميرة أفيري. لماذا تقاطع أعمال حبي! أليسنا مجرد أصدقاء؟ مستحيل! في هذه الحياة سأكون صديقا مثل عائلة نامجو!
 
 مستحيل! في هذه الحياة
 
 سأكون صديقا مثل عائلة نامجو!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%97%AC%EC%9E%90%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%8C%EC%B9%9C%EA%B5%AC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/3360), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61313362)
description.en:
She became the failed-in-love, jealous inducer, female friend of the male lead. In addition, the character even has an unrequited love for the male lead. She would be ruined. As long as this was the case, she decided to just become friends! It was nice to have the first meeting with such a young male lead…

"Hello, Miss Bouser."

"Uwa!!"

*You were mistaken for a girl and you cried?*

Fortunately, she managed to resolve the misunderstanding and become close friends. However, the male lead in his childhood is more shy and soft-hearted than she had thought. Eventually, she became attached to the male lead and decided to become a real friend. However, due to the disturbance of the male lead's father and the war which broke out, they had to be separated for a long time. She thought she could barely meet him again and stay the same as before but…

"Your eyes must have dropped a lot since I didn't see you. Princess Averine!"

*What's wrong with him now?! It's not just that. Rather than getting along, he keeps getting into trouble when he has a chance, and most of all, he even bothers my love life!! Aren't we just friends?!*

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%97%AC%EC%9E%90%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%8C%EC%B9%9C%EA%B5%AC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/3360), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61313362)
description.ru:
Я переродилась… в страдающую от неразделённой любви подругу сумасшедшего главного героя Людрига Баузера?!Я, Далия Эйверин, чья жизнь была предназначена для любовных игр основных персонажей… Собираюсь сполна насладиться богатством и крутить страстные романы с красивыми мужчинами!Но…— Здравствуйте, леди Баузер.— …Уа-а-а!Я приняла Людрига за девушку и… довела его до слёз?Однако потом мы даже сдружились. Только вот после разлучившей нас войны…— Кажется, с последней нашей встречи вы стали гораздо ниже, герцогиня Эйверин.Почему ты вмешиваешься в мои любовные дела? Разве мы не просто друзья?Ну уж нет! В этой жизни я буду другом, который станет Людригу «семьёй»!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%97%AC%EC%9E%90%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%8C%EC%B9%9C%EA%B5%AC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/3360), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61313362)

title.en: I, Who Am Ignorant of This World, Became a Princess

altTitles.en: I've Become a Princess Because I'm Ignorant of This World

altTitles.es-la: Me Convertiré En La Futura Emperatriz Pero No Se Mucho De Este Mundo

description.en:
Jeong-min, who accidentally tore up her classmates’ novel, suddenly found herself in the world of the torn novel after she woke up.
For a bookworm like her, both her current situation and the new world she is in are completely incomprehensible.

Though she has no knowledge of the world she is in, her unique fiery personality will make up for it.

That’s why, no matter what obstacles come’s her way, she will give it her best!

title.en: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier

altTitles.ja: ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア

description.en:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！

altTitles.ja: 科学部ガール

altTitles.fr: La fille du club de science

description.ja: 美術部ガールの外伝作品です🧪

altTitles.ru: Поднятие уровня начиная с максимального возможного

description.en:
Max-level internal arts, max-level external arts.

Jianghu, Murim’s famous and strongest, Cha Shin Hyeon.

I came back to Earth after reaching the peak of martial arts, but why has everything changed so much?

A world where monsters are coming out of dungeons, and hunters are leveling up via their status windows.

‘Start again from level one? That doesn’t phase me at all, since my martial arts are already at the max level.’
description.fr:
Arts extérieurs au maximum. Arts internes au maximum.
Cha Shin-Hyun, l’être le plus fort, fidèle à son nom, dans le monde des arts martiaux.

Après avoir terminé les arts martiaux et être retourné sur Terre, les choses semblent avoir bien changé.
C’est maintenant un monde où les monstres sortent des donjons et où les chasseurs augmentent leur niveau grâce à leur fenêtre d’état.

Tu commences au niveau 1 ? Qui s’en soucie ? Mes arts martiaux sont déjà au niveau maximum.
description.ko:
외공만렙, 내공만렙
강호무림의 명실상부한 천하제일인 차신현.

무공의 끝에 도달하고 지구로 귀환했는데, 어째 뭔가 많이 달라져 있다?
던전에서 몬스터가 튀어나오고 헌터가 상태창으로 레벨을 올리는 세상.

'1레벨부터 시작이라고? 
 아무렴 어떠냐. 
 이미 내 무공은 만렙이거든.'
description.ru:
Вы достигли максимального уровня.
Ча Шин Хён бесспорно лучший в мире. Почему после конца пустоты и возвращения, Земля настолько изменилась?
Мир, в котором монстры выходят из подземелий, и охотники повышающие уровень за счет окна статуса.
«Начать с 1 уровня? Что же мне делать, если я уже достиг максимального уровня?»
description.pt-br:
Artes internas de nível máximo, artes externas de nível máximo...
Cha Shin Hyeon, o mais famoso e mais forte de Murim, de Jianghu.
'Voltei para a Terra depois de atingir o auge das artes marciais, mas por que tudo mudou tanto?
Um mundo onde os monstros estão saindo das masmorras e os caçadores estão subindo de nível por meio de suas janelas de status.
Começar de novo a partir do nível um? Não importa, as minhas artes marciais já estão no nível máximo.'

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

altTitles.ja: ディザインズ

description.en:
Beyond the natural world lies a breed of abnormal beings... HA, or Humanized Animals. 
They are a hybrid of human and animal, "designed" at the genetic level. Possessing astonishing physical capabilities, 
these HA are deployed into scenes of intrigue by certain ambitious individuals, seeking to showcase their true value. 

For what purpose did humans design these beings? Behind it all lies a grand plan connected to the future of humanity!

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: ロイヤル・マリッジ

description.en:
The symbol of beauty and money, Tatiana Cartien, the most eligible bachelorette of the Freya Empire. The despair of being betrayed by her trusted fiancé lasted only a moment, as who could've known a bigger shock would happen.

"I'll only endure for a few days, getting discovered in an idiotic manners of all ways."

To think that her family, who she believed was on her side, knew her fiancé's nature. Tatiana threatened to never get married, and her mother, who once coddled her, abandoned her.

"If you say you don't want to then I guess you should leave this house."

"..."

"Of course, you should leave behind everything I've given to you."

The time she has left is one week. If she can't find someone worth marrying, she'll be kicked out onto the streets with nothing.

Just when she thought, "Is this the end?" one person came to mind! Kainel Towncent, an illegitimate child who had once been treated with contempt, who then rose from mercenary to the hailed war hero of Freya in 3 years.

A road with a dead end, there's nothing left to lose. In order to survive in this grim world, grabbing the hand of the devil is enough.

"Tatiana Cartien. No matter what anyone says from now on, you're the lady of Towncent. If you come to me with an offer of marriage first, then you need to take responsibility until the end."

---
As the beloved daughter of a viscountess and the fiancée of a duke, Tatiana Cartienne was the belle of high society. But when she refuses to marry after discovering the duke's infidelity, she begins to see that she was simply a pawn in her family's power play. In her attempt to break free, she turns to Kynell Townsend, a war hero who was once humiliated by the viscountess for his attempt to woo Tatiana. With title and fortune out of the picture, will they be able to reset their love story?
description.fr: Fille adorée d'une vicomtesse et fiancée d'un duc, Tatiana Cartien était la fleur de la haute société. Mais lorsqu'elle refuse de se marier après avoir découvert l'infidélité du duc, elle commence à comprendre qu'elle n'était qu'un pion dans l’échiquier du pouvoir de sa famille. Pour tenter de se libérer de cette dernière, elle se tourne vers Kainel Towncent, un héros de guerre qui a été humilié quelques années plutôt par la vicomtesse pour avoir tenté de séduire Tatiana. Sans titre ni fortune, parviendront-ils à relancer leur histoire d'amour ?
description.ru: Татьяне Картье осталась неделя чтобы найти мужа, после того, как он предал её. Последним, о ком она думала, был наёмник Кайнел Таунсенд. Она решает более никому не доверять, и заключить с ним брак по контракту, но... Почему её сердце так быстро бьётся?
description.uk:
Символ краси і грошей, Татьяна Картьє - найшанованіша наречена в імперії Фрея. 
ЇЇ розпач від зради власного нареченого тривав лише одну мить, адже хто б знав, що далі справи підуть тільки гірше.

"Міг почекати декілька днів, а не попастися як ідіот." 

Я вірила, що моя родина на моїй стороні, але вони знали про зраду мого нареченого. Через свої погрози, що вона ніколи не вийде заміж, мати Татьяни, яка так сильно любила її, відвернулася від неї. 
Якщо тобі щось не подобається, то можеш забиратися геть.
“... “
І звісно ж, ти повинна залишити все, що я тобі дала.
У неї залишився всього лиш тиждень. Якщо вона за цей час вона не знайде собі чоловіка, її виженуть на вулицю ні з чим.

І в мить, коли вона подумала:”Це кінець”, на думку спала одна людина!
Кайнель Таунсент, позашлюбна дитина до якої ставилися з презирством, який за три роки прославився, як герой війни Фреї.

Загнана в глухий кут, де немає нічого втрачати. Для виживання в цьому світі, потрібно схопити диявола за руку

“Татьяна Картьє, щоб хто не казав, але віднині ви леді Таунсест.
Якщо ти перша запропонувала мені одружитися, то будь готова взяти на себе відповідальність до самого кінця.”

description.en:
After dying in an accident, I was reincarnated in an otome game …as a **crow**! I can't believe that I am a crow! Not an extra character, but a crow! When I was looking for a person near me… the first person who appeared was the Crown Prince.

"How could you be so lovely, Reinel?"

"Cawk cawk, cawk! (Take me with you and raise me!)"

The Crown Prince, Kamut, gave me a name and treated me with love. I'm just a crow anyway, there'd be no problem if I liked him or if my heart fluttered for him. There was no problem until…

"Hello, Reinel?"

"What is happening to me all of a sudden?"

---
Life is about survival of the fittest... But what do you do when you're reborn as a crow? Find someone big and strong to take you in, of course! After saving Prince Camute's life, Rainelle is brought to the imperial palace to live as his pet. However, just as she believes she's set to live a life of comfort, she finds herself caught at the center of a dangerous power struggle between Prince Camute and his brother. Now that her survival depends on his, will Rainelle find a way to help her prince?

زندگی درباره زنده موندن بهترین هاست... اما وقتی دوباره به عنوان یک کلاغ متولد می شی چیکار می کنی؟ مطمئناً، یک نفر بزرگ و قوی رو پیدا می کنی که تو رو با خودش ببره! بعد نجات دادن جون پرنس کاموت، راینل به کاخ امپراطوری اورده می شه تا به عنوان حیوون خونگیش زندگی کنه. با این حال، همونطور که مطمئنه که قراره یک زندگی راحت داشته باشه، خودش رو در مرکز یک جنگ قدرت خطرناک بین پرنس کاموت و برادرش می بینه. حالا که زنده موندنش به کاموت بستگی داره، راینل می تونه راهی برای کمک به پرنسش پیدا کنه؟

Rainelle a enfin réalisé son rêve absolu: travailler dans l'enclos des prédateurs du zoo! Évidemment, travailler avec des animaux aussi dangereux présente des risques… Attaquée par une de ces bêtes qu'elle vénère tant, elle se réveille alors dans un autre monde! Eh oui, Rainelle a été réincarnée… comme dans ses smartoons préférés! Et en quoi a-t-elle été réincarnée? Une princesse? Une marquise? Un loup ou un tigre majestueux? Que nenni… Elle a été réincarnée en vieux corbeau de malheur!

description.id:
Setelah mati saat bekerja, aku berakhir masuk ke dunia game yang aku mainkan 3 tahun lalu. Namun, bukannya merasuki manusia, aku justru merasuki gagak! Saat aku sedang mencari orang yang ingin memelihara aku, aku bertemu dengan pangeran ke-1, Khamut. Khamut yang baik hati ini memperlakukanku dengan sangat spesial, bahkan memberiku nama, Raynel. Karena aku hanya gagak, tidak masalah kan kalau hatiku berdebar dengan perlakuannya dan berakhir menyukainya? Pasti tidak akan ada masalah, kan…?

description.ko:
사고로 죽은 뒤 여성향 게임에 환생, 아니 빙의해 버렸다.
…그것도 까마귀로!
내가 까마귀라니! 지나가는 엑스트라1도 아니고 까마귀라니!

주변에 키워 줄 사람을 찾으려 했는데… 나타난 사람이 황태자?

"레이넬, 넌 정말 어쩜 이리도 사랑스럽니."
"까아아아악, 까악!(그럼 날 데려다 키워 줘!)"

나에게 이름도 지어 주고 사랑도 주는 황태자, 카무트.
어차피 나는 까마귀니까 저놈이 좋아한다 해도,
내가 그의 행동에 설레도 전혀 문제없겠지.
문제가 없을 뻔했는데…….

"안녕, 레이넬?"

나한테 갑자기 무슨 일이 일어난 거지?

※ 본 작품은 동명의 소설을 원작으로 한 웹툰으로, 일부 내용이 웹툰에 맞춰 각색 되어 원작과 다르게 표현될 수 있습니다.

Bir kazada öldükten sonra bir otome oyununda reenkarne oldum. …Karga Olarak! Karga olduğuma inanamıyorum!
Fazladan bir karakter değil, bir karga! Etrafımda birini ararken… İlk ortaya çıkan kişi Veliaht Prens oldu.
“Nasıl bu kadar sevimli olabiliyorsun, Reinel?” “Gaak, Gaak! (Beni de yanına al ve büyüt!)” Veliaht Prens bana bir isim verdi ve bana sevgiyle yaklaştı. Zaten ben bir kargayım, ondan hoşlansam ya da kalbim onun için çırpınsa sorun olmazdı.
“Merhaba, Reinel?” “Birden vücuduma ne oluyor?”

Якщо й перероджуватись в отоме-грі то гарною дівчиною, але ж ні. Наша героїня загинула та переродилася - вороною?! Як тепер жити? Невже тепер моя доля їсти черв'яків? Ні за що, краще вже стати чиїмось домашнім улюбленцем. Особливо якщо це привабливий принц.

description.pt-br:
Depois de morrer em um acidente, ela reencarnou em um otome game... Como um corvo! Não acredito que sou um corvo! Nem pra eu ser uma figurante! Quando eu estava observando a primeira pessoa que apareceu para mim... Era o príncipe herdeiro. "Como você pode ser tão amável, Reinel?" Cawk, cawk caek (Me leve contigo e me crie!)" O príncipe herdeiro, Karmeut, me deu um nome e me tratou com carinho. Eu sou um corvo, afinal. Não vai ter problema se eu tratá-lo com amor ou se meu coração se revira por ele. Não tinha problema até... "Olá, Reinel?" "O que aconteceu de repente comigo?"

description.en: Because Rein was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.
description.es: Debido a que Rein era un domador de bestias débil y simple, fue expulsado del grupo del héroe, pero eso no detuvo su deseo de ser un aventurero. Al realizar misiones simples después, tiene un encuentro destinado con una niña gata fuerte.
description.pt-br: O domador de feras Rein, que usa animais, era um membro do grupo do herói. No entanto, como não podia fazer mais nada, não conseguiu acompanhar o ritmo da batalha. “Você só sabe brincar com os animais. Está despedido’. Rein é expulso do grupo e agora vive livremente como um aventureiro. Em sua jornada, ele conhece uma garota de uma tribo de gatos, a chamada espécie mais forte. Por outro lado, o grupo do herói permanece inconsciente de que seu sucesso anterior foi tudo graças a Rein… Esta é a história de um domador de feras que não se segura mais e seu fatídico encontro com uma companheira preciosa.

altTitles.ja: グラップラー刃牙完全版

altTitles.en: Beastly Maze, The Lost City of Alien Beasts

description.en: Gao Yang, an orphan, crosses over to a "parallel world" at the age of six and starts living in a warm family of five. At the age of eighteen, Gao Yang accidentally discovers the true nature of the world: it's not a parallel world at all but a mysterious realm, and the family and friends around him are all terrifying "beasts"!
description.ru: Гао Ян — сирота, который в возрасте шести лет попал в «параллельный мир» и с тех пор жил в хорошей семье из пяти человек. Когда ему было восемнадцать, Гао Ян случайно открыл правду о мире: это был вовсе не параллельный мир, а загадочное царство, в котором все его близкие на самом деле были "зверьми»!
description.zh: 高阳是个孤儿,六岁穿越到“平行世界”,从此生活在一个 温馨的五口之家。十八岁那年,高阳偶然发现世界真 相:这里根本不是平行世界,而是一个神秘领域,身边 的亲人朋友全是可怕的“兽”!

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

title.en: Becoming a Wicked Witch With a Paladin’s First Night

altTitles.es: La villana se robó la virginidad del caballero santo

altTitles.ja: 聖騎士の初夜を奪った悪女

description.en:
I was hit by a truck and transported to the world of a novel I had read. Unfortunately, I was possessed by Elenia Alfin, the evil woman from the novel, and the story begins with me sleeping in the same bed as the most loyal holy knight, Sir Rolento, if you know what I mean…

I remembered from the novel, “If a holy knight has a relationship with a woman, he is stripped of his status as a holy knight,” so I decided to try to avoid it and pretend that nothing had happened between the two of us.

Then, Rolento said something shocking: “Please, take responsibility for stealing my virginity.

altTitles.ja: 【推しの子】

altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

description.en:
When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

---
**Contents:** 147 (or 410 split chapter parts) (S1) + >197 (S2) = >344 chapters
- **Season 1:** vol. 1 ch. 1-147 (1-147)
- **Season 2:** vol. 2 ch. 1-197+ (148-344+) (ongoing)

**Note:** season 1 chapter 1-114 is in single page format. Starting with season 1 chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

altTitles.en: Death God of the Drifting Moon

altTitles.fr: La faucheuse de la lune errante

altTitles.ja: 死神漂月〜暗闇からの刺客〜

altTitles.es-la: El Asesino de la Luna a la Deriva

description.de:
Pyo Wol ist ein einfaches Waisenkind und durchstreift alleine den gesamten Kontinent, bis er eines Tages auf einen mysteriösen Mann trifft und plötzlich das Bewusstsein verliert. Als er wieder zu sich kommt, befindet er sich in einem dunklen, engen Raum mit einer eisernen Tür als einzigem Ausgang. Irgendwie schafft Wol es, die nächsten grausamen Monate zu überleben, während er versucht, einen kühlen Kopf zu bewahren und seinen Körper auf das vorzubereiten, was folgen könnte. Als sich die eiserne Tür endlich öffnet, erfährt Wol, dass er an diesem schrecklichen Ort nicht alleine ist: Eine Gruppe Maskierter hat 300 Kinder entführt, um sie zu menschlichen Waffen auszubilden. Nun liegt es an Wol, zu kämpfen und die anderen umzubringen – denn nur die wenigsten können überleben und am Ende ausgewählt werden. Wird er es schaffen, seinen Kidnappern zu entkommen?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55706014)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%82%AC%EC%8B%A0%ED%91%9C%EC%9B%94/2937), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59771249)

description.en:
He’s in the deepest part of the Jianghu. Keep your eyes wide open if you do not wish to get dragged into the abyss.

Kidnapped children raised 7 years in darkness for a single assassination mission that goes awry.

---
Pyo Wol was an orphan who wandered around the continent until he bumped into a mysterious man and lost consciousness. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a dark, confined space with only one iron door for an exit. Wol survives the next several grueling months, trying to keep a cool head and stay in shape. When the iron door finally opens, he discovers he's not the only one in this miserable situation. A group of masked people has kidnapped 300 children to train them into human weapons. Wol must fight and kill the others, for only a handful of the strongest will be selected. Will Wol be able to become one of the chosen and find a way to free himself from his captors?

description.en:
One night a mysterious and unexplained phenomenon occurs in the nine provinces. Five years later Chu Feng, a regular outer disciple of the Azure Dragon school, awakens one of the mysterious nine lightning beasts. And discovers an egg sealed inside him.  
  
From there we follow Chu Feng on his path of cultivation.
